headline: Should KKR’s (KKR) Offshore Wind JV and Asia Credit Fundraise Require Action From Investors?
summary: Recently, KKR and RWE agreed to form a 50:50 joint venture to develop and operate the Norfolk Vanguard East and West UK offshore wind projects, which together are planned to add about 3 GW of capacity with more than US$15.00 billion in total investment and targeted operations around 2029–2030. This move, alongside KKR’s completion of a US$2.50 billion Asia private credit fundraise, highlights how the firm is pairing large-scale infrastructure exposure with expanded credit capabilities across...
